card_text: If this card is sent to the GY: You can activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each effect of "Volcanic Rimfire" once per turn);$N●Banish this card from your GY, and if you do, send 1 "Volcanic" monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Volcanic Rimfire".$N●Banish 1 "Blaze Accelerator" card from your face-up field or GY, and if you do, place 1 "Blaze Accelerator" Continuous Spell/Trap from your hand or Deck face-up on your field.
